issue.title: Missing docstring for re-exported EventId
issue.description: The re-exported EventId lacks a docstring explaining its purpose and usage in the domain layer context
issue.recommendation: Add a docstring to document the re-exported EventId class and its role in the domain layer

review.summary: Simple value object adapter that re-exports EventId from core identifiers module. Follows Neo-Commons clean core principle by importing from core and maintaining domain layer naming conventions. Very minimal implementation with proper separation of concerns.

positive_observations.observation: Correctly follows Clean Core principle by importing from neo_commons.core.value_objects
Maintains domain layer naming by re-exporting as EventId for clear domain context
Excellent separation of concerns with minimal file focused on single purpose
Follows Neo-Commons feature isolation pattern with proper import from core
Uses appropriate comment explaining the re-export purpose

context.tests: No tests present (expected for simple re-export)
context.documentation: Has module-level docstring and inline comment explaining re-export
context.configuration: No configuration needed for this simple adapter
